Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — twenty-two lines in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines: Swete lady seinte Mariefful of alle Curtesie…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And also alle cristene menGod lord Ihesu Amen
                    AMEN

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULDd1426.First Lines:
Swete lady virgen seynte maryffulle of grace and
                    curtesy…
CULDd1426.Last Lines: …And alle cristen menSwete ihesu cryste amen

CULIi643.First Lines: SWete ladye seynt maryeffull of all curtesye…
CULIi643.Last Lines: …And all cristen menSwete ihesu cryst Amen
CULIi643.Attributed Title: oracio bona de sancta maria Sequens (f. 91v)

BLAdd37787.First Lines: Swete lady seynt mariefful of alle curtesye…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines: …And also alle cristen menSwet Jhesu amen amen

Baugh,  Nita Scudder. 
             A Worcestershire Miscellany, compiled by John

BLHar210.First Lines:
SWete leuedi synte mariefful of grace and curteysieModer of
                    merci & of piteMin hop of help is al on þe…
BLHar210.Last Lines:
…And ȝif ham god lif and gode hendeAnd ioie whan þei
                    hennis wendeAnd cristenemen SWete ihesi am

EDU114.Last Lines: …[ ] alle crysten menSwete ihesu amen amen
